title: Letter to a friend containing certain observations upon some passages which have been published in a late libell intituled, The third part of no Protestant-plot and which do relate to the kingdom of Ireland.
author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.
notes: Attributed by Wing to R. Ferguson.
"The authorship of No Protestant plot is usualy ascribed to Shaftesbury, but claimed by Robert Ferguson"--National union catalog pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
